definition: Bangalore, capital of southwest Indian state Karnataka 卡納塔克邦|卡纳塔克邦[Ka3 na4 ta3 ke4 bang1]
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: He outsourced the computer department and online customer service to Mumbai and Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 他将电脑部和在线客服业务外包给孟买和班加罗尔。

sentences.english: Most of his friends had either moved to Bangalore or were unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 他的绝大多数朋友要么去班加罗尔，要么失业在家。

sentences.english: Last few days in Bangalore , LG and I are very busy.
sentences.chinese: 在班加罗尔的最后几天，我和LG是紧紧张张的。

sentences.english: And in India ? You have to spend 52 hours from PATNA TO BANGALURU.
sentences.chinese: 印度呢？你从巴特那到班加罗尔得花52小时。

sentences.english: Butterflies of the milkweed family sit on a tree branch in Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 斑蝶栖息在印度班加罗尔市内的一棵树的树枝上。

sentences.english: Don't watch the technical construction, next bangalore is not coming India.
sentences.chinese: 不观赏下班加罗尔的科技建筑，真是不算来了印度。

sentences.english: Within weeks, I had joined the honking swarm driving in Bangalore.
sentences.chinese: 没几个周，我就加入到班加罗尔蜂拥的汽车大军当中。

definition: Pune, second city of Mahārāshtra 馬哈拉施特拉邦|马哈拉施特拉邦 in western India
Chennai, capital of southeast Indian state Tamil Nadu 泰米爾納德邦|泰米尔纳德邦[Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1]/formerly called Madras 馬德拉斯|马德拉斯[Ma3 de2 la1 si1]
Andhra Pradesh or Andhra State in southeast India
Chandighar, capital of Punjab state of northwest India
Ahmedabad, largest city in west Indian state Gujarat 古吉拉特[Gu3 ji2 la1 te4]
pinyin: Ai4 ha1 mai4 da2 ba1 de2

definition: Karnataka, southwest Indian state, capital Bangalore 班加羅爾|班加罗尔[Ban1 jia1 luo2 er3]/formerly Mysore

pinyin: Ma3 ha1 la1 shi1 te4 la1 bang1

definition: Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]
pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1

definition: Punjab state in northwest India bordering Pakistan
